name: Zombie Evil Survival: Last Day
description:
Previously, everyone was playing plants, now only zombies are left, but strong guys will come out against them, who will fight back everyone who crosses their path.

Create groups of fighters who will destroy zombies and other creatures. The game is a type of build defense in the tower, which will allow you to think during the game and develop.
Pump the characters, they will be stronger and more powerful!

Features Survival Zombie Battle: Z Day:

- More than 40 levels
- Many characters
- Many weapons


Download Survival Zombie Battle: Z Day and stay tuned, there will be new levels with zombies and possibly other characters.
